name: David H. Parramon
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Senior Full-stack engineer with strong focus on Front End, with 10+ years of experience building React/Next.js applications, complex UI systems, and scalable SaaS products. Experience across USA and EU markets. Expertise in performance optimization, design systems, modern FE architectures, and product-focused development.

experience.summary: Strengthened full-stack development expertise through personal projects.
highlights: Continuing education and hands-on projects to stay current with industry trends and technologies.
Built full-stack apps to deepen server-side and cloud deployment knowledge.
Experimented with AI/LLM integrations and GraphQL API development.
Contributing to open-source and monitoring emerging technologies.

experience.summary: Implemented, improved and maintained multiple large code bases across multiple projects and clients.
highlights: Developed image/video file management system with React/Next.js and Node/GraphQL.
Integrated AI image recognition and LLM-based content generation.
Migrated analytics to GA4 and built event-based tracking pipelines.

experience.summary: Worked on travel and hospitality websites for major banking companies with focus on accessibility, responsiveness and browser compatibility.
highlights: Contributed to high-traffic travel applications for banking clients.
Improved performance and accessibility across multiple sites.
Redesigned checkout modules increasing transaction completion.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver quality products on time.

experience.summary: Mobile & Front-end development, UX/UI Design, Code development, focusing on old browser compatibility and accessibility.
highlights: Designed and built responsive, cross-browser websites.
Created React-based promotional site and Android app.

experience.summary: Developed a remote lab system for managing virtual machines and integrating video surveillance for remote access to lab equipment.
highlights: Developed remote lab system with Python, PHP, PostgreSQL.

education.institution: UPC - Universitat Politecnica de Catalunya (Catalan Politecnics University)
education.focus: Network communications protocols, full-stack web development, network systems architecture, cryptography, electronics, statistics, CI/CD.

project.summary: Design and Implementation of Android Application for classroom schedule information and teacher-student communication via QR code scanning.
